sources.description:
tars: Jock Mahoney, Greta Thyssen, Jesse White
Director: Leon Chooluck

In this potent slice of pulp fiction, a hard-as-nails detective gets tripped up by a trio of voluptuous blondes while investigating the disappearance of a crooked colleague! Stars rugged Jock Mahoney of "The Range Rider" fame and stunning beauty Greta Thysen, Miss Denmark of 1952.
